Clarification sought from GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceuticals Ltd on August 1 2025 with reference to news appeared in https://www.moneycontrol.com dated August 1 2025 quoting "Trump Tariff News Live: GSK and AstraZeneca among top companies told to cut US prices or else".

The reply is awaited.
